response.original_title: いちゃKISS甘あまレズデート。夜が全て忘れさせる前に唾液を絡めてスキを伝えて、キミの体温も愛液も愛しくて。世界に必要なのは私たち2人だけ。
response.overview: Amiri and Sakura—real-life close friends and twin-like AV stars—embark on a passionate lesbian kiss date through the streets of Tokyo. Unbothered by the public gaze, they share thousands of kisses, each one a heartbeat of affection. Their lips meet again and again, igniting warmth, arousal, and a desire to melt into one another.  Sweat, saliva, and love juices blend as their bodies entwine in a feverish embrace. Their connection deepens through intimate tribbing, soft moans, and whispered confessions of love. Even after climax, they crave more—more closeness, more kisses, more of each other.  In a world that feels like a dream, absolute love exists only in the space between Amiri and Sakura. This is not just sex—it's a celebration of devotion, desire, and the kind of bond that transcends everything.
response.title: Icha KISS Amaama Rezu Deeto. Yoru ga subete wasuresaseru mae ni daeki o karamete suki o tsutaete, kimi no taion mo aieki mo itoshikute. Sekai ni hitsuyou na no wa watashitachi futari dake.

titles.title: Icha KISS Amaama Rezu Dēto. Yoru ga subete wasuresaseru mae ni daeki o karamete suki o tsutaete, kimi no taion mo aieki mo itoshikute. Sekai ni hitsuyō na no wa watashitachi futari dake.
